TopicTitle: Anybody, i need a savegame full of debris in lko

Articles.Content: I've built a ssto called "amber", it is meant to be used to get rid of my debris in lko, but my main save game is on another pc i cant access for a week. Can anybody upload me your save file, containing some random debris in random orbits? I want to do it as a challenge for myself. I think that this forum section is the best to post this request in.
build a ship covered in radial decouplers and/or make the ship completely disasemble itself via decouplers in orbit, after a few launches youll have plenty of debris.
I'm a little bit too lazy to do that aand i dont want it to be so.. artificial. There won't be that much randomness.

Or just use Hyperedit to teleport stuff where ever you want:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/37756-0-25-HyperEdit-Teleporter-Orbit-Planet-Editor-More

I'm too lazy to do it myself, but I want others to go through the trouble of saving and uploading their saves which will totally be easy. Especially considering i didn't even put any parameters on this (pure stock, modded, current version or not, Career vs sandbox).

Will totally end well.

Just use hyperedit as Caelib suggested.
If you're too lazy to put the stuff in orbit, odds are we're too lazy to do it for you and send you our save file.
Well, theoretically I could upload one of mine. Not sure how much debris you're looking for, but I've reached the limit on of of my career modes a few times.

I'm a little bit too lazy to do that aand i dont want it to be so.. artificial. There won't be that much randomness.

You can get alot of randomness if you want. Send up a rocket core, Attached to that core have some part with a seperatron attached to a radial decoupler. Use symmetry to duplicate the part. Make as many rings of these dibrise parts as you want on the rocket. Once in orbit kick 1 round of them off (decouplers and seperatrons fired at the same time). Give a small burn to adjust your orbit a bit and timewarp half an orbit or so and kick off another ring. Do this till your out of debris then return to space center and timewarp a few days of game time. You'll have a whole bunch of dibrise in simirandom roughly equatorial orbits. The time warping will let the debris cloud spread out and the seperatrons will make each one have a different orbit from others kicked off at the same time.
I would have a lot of debris...If my debris made it to orbit...
I have a lot of debris on my save, but I'm not pre releasing any crafts for you to upload!

Well, theoretically I could upload one of mine. Not sure how much debris you're looking for, but I've reached the limit on of of my career modes a few times.

Would be very appreciated.
